title: ApprovalTests Failed When Building with CMake+Ninja.
body:
## Description

Always failed `ApprovalTests` when using ninja to build.
Doesn't have any issue when using makefile (no matter build with serial execution or with `-j`).

```
[xkszltl@CentOS build]$ cmake --build . --target test
[0/1] Running tests...
Test project /media/Scratch/Catch2/build
    Start 1: RunTests
1/8 Test #1: RunTests .........................   Passed    0.03 sec
    Start 2: ListTests
2/8 Test #2: ListTests ........................   Passed    0.01 sec
    Start 3: ListTags
3/8 Test #3: ListTags .........................   Passed    0.01 sec
    Start 4: ListReporters
4/8 Test #4: ListReporters ....................   Passed    0.01 sec
    Start 5: ListTestNamesOnly
5/8 Test #5: ListTestNamesOnly ................   Passed    0.01 sec
    Start 6: NoAssertions
6/8 Test #6: NoAssertions .....................   Passed    0.02 sec
    Start 7: NoTest
7/8 Test #7: NoTest ...........................   Passed    0.00 sec
    Start 8: ApprovalTests
8/8 Test #8: ApprovalTests ....................***Failed  Error regular expression found in output. Regex=[Results differed]  1.60 sec

88% tests passed, 1 tests failed out of 8

Total Test time (real) =   1.73 sec

The following tests FAILED:
	  8 - ApprovalTests (Failed)
Errors while running CTest
FAILED: CMakeFiles/test.util 
cd /media/Scratch/Catch2/build && /usr/local/bin/ctest --force-new-ctest-process
ninja: build stopped: subcommand failed.
```

### Steps to reproduce

```
mkdir build
cd build
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -GNinja ..
cmake --build .
cmake --build . --target test
```

### Extra information
<!--
Fill in any extra information that might be important for your issue.

If your issue is a bugreport, definitely fill out at least the following.
-->
* Catch version: **v2.4.0**
* Operating System: **CentOS 7**
* Compiler+version: **gcc 7.3.1 (from devtoolset-7) + cmake 3.12.2**
